title: 70: The Great Pumpkin Haul Episode
itunes:title: The Great Pumpkin Haul Episode
description: The aroma of pumpkin spice is in the air... That must mean it’s time for HG’s GREAT PUMPKIN HAUL 2019! In this episode, Lisa and the gang are CHEW & TELLING (almost) everything under the sun that has pumpkin in it! From healthy soups, spreads, and yogurts to frozen treats, bars, and coffee — we’re trying it all!! Plus, the one frozen treat that scored a whopping 11 on a scale that goes up to 10. So what are you waiting for? GET PUMPed & PUSH PLAY NOW! And don’t forget to head on over to our Foodcast page for a list of all the products mentioned in the episode.
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
